title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Transport (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Transport (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited transport (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Transport conferred on him - 

(a) by or under the enactments specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 

(b) by or under the provisions of the enactments specified in Part 2 

of the Schedule, and 

(c) 

under the provisions of the Regulations specified in Part 3 of the 
Schedule, 

are delegated to Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the Department of 
Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [759] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister transport conferred - (a) enactment specified part 1 schedule (b) provision enactment specified part 2 schedule (c) provision regulation specified part 3 schedule delegated hildegarde naughton minister state department transport notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 5th january 2021 759 3

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: Merchant Shipping Acts 1894 to 2015
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part I 

Merchant Shipping Acts 1894 to 2015 

Road Transport Act 1933 (No. 8 of 1933) 

Road Transport Act 1934 (No. 17 of 1934) 

Road Transport Act 1935 (No. 23 of 1935) 

Air Navigation and Transport Acts 1936 to 1998 

Customs-free Airport Acts 1947 and 1958 

Mercantile Marine Acts 1955 and 2006 

Road Traffic Acts 1961 to 2018 

Road Transport Act 1971 (No. 8 of 1971) 

Local Authorities (Traffic Wardens) Act 1975 (No. 14 of 1975) 

Road Transport Act 1978 (No. 8 of 1978) 

Free Ports Act 1986 (No. 6 of 1986) 

Road Transport Act 1986 (No. 16 of 1986) 

Shipping Investment Grants Act 1987 (No. 21 of 1987) 

Dublin Transport Authority (Dissolution) Act 1987 (No. 34 of 1987) 

Oil Pollution of the Sea (Civil Liability and Compensation) Acts 1988 to 2003 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [759] 

Sea Pollution Acts 1991 to 2014 

Irish Aviation Authority Act 1993 (No. 29 of 1993) 

Harbours Act 1996 to 2015 

Road Transport Act 1999 (No. 15 of 1999) 

Air Navigation and Transport (Indemnities) Act 2001 (No. 48 of 2001) 

Aviation Regulation Acts 2001 to 2004 

Aer Lingus Act 2004 (No. 10 of 2004) 

Air Navigation and Transport (International Conventions) Act 2004 (No. 11 of 
2004) 

State Airports Act 2004 (No. 32 of 2004) 

Sea Pollution (Hazardous Substances) (Compensation) Act 2005 (No. 9 of 2005) 

Air Navigation and Transport (Indemnities) Act 2005 (No. 13 of 2005) 

Road Safety Authority Act 2006 (No. 14 of 2006) 

Road Traffic and Transport Act 2006 (No. 28 of 2006) 

Aviation (Preclearance) Act 2009 (No. 16 of 2009) 

Road Transport Act 2011 (No. 31 of 2011) 

Road Safety Authority (Commercial Vehicle Roadworthiness) Act 2012 (No. 16 
of 2012) 

State Airport (Shannon Group) Act 2014 (No. 27 of 2014) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [759] 5 

Vehicle Clamping Act 2015 (No. 13 of 2015) 

International Interests in Mobile Equipment (Cape Town Convention) Act 2005 
(No. 15 of 2005) 

Vehicle Registration Data (Automated Searching and Exchange) Act 2018 (No. 
5 of 2018) 

Aircraft Noise (Dublin Airport) Regulation Act 2019 (No. 12 of 2019) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [759] 

Part 2 

Sections 12 and 19(3) of the Roads Act 1920 (No. 72 of 1920) 

Section 13 of the Finance Act 1920 (No. 18 of 1920) 

Section 22 of the Finance Act 1921 (No. 32 of 1921) 

Sections 25 and 26 of the Intoxicating Liquor Act 1943 (No. 7 of 1943) 

Section 1 of the Finance (Excise Duties) Act 1952 (No. 24 of 1952) 

Section 12(1) of the Consular Conventions Act 1954 (No. 10 of 1954) 

Section 4 of the Finance (Excise Duties) (Vehicles) (Amendment) Act 1960 (No. 
1 of 1960) 

Sections 65, 66 and 67 of the Finance Act 1976 (No. 16 of 1976) 

Section 4A of the Marine Institute Act 1991 (No. 2 of 1991) 

Chapter II of Part II of the Finance (No. 2) Act 1992 (No. 28 of 1992) 

Chapter II of Part II of the Finance Act 1993 (No. 13 of 1993) 

Section 35(1)(a) and (b) of the Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) and, in so 
far as it relates to maritime transport, safety and security, paragraph (c) of that 
subsection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [759] 7 

Part 3 

Road Vehicles (Registration and Licensing) Order 1958 (S.I. No. 15 of 1958) 

Air Navigation (Carriage of Munitions of War, Weapons and Dangerous Goods) 
Order 1973 (S.I. No. 224 of 1973) 

Tour Operators and Travel Agents (Bonding) Regulations 1983 (S.I. No. 102 of 
1983) 

Transport (Tour Operators and Travel Agents) Act, 1982 (Claims by Customers) 
Regulations 1983 (S.I. No. 104 of 1983) 

Travellers' Protection Fund Regulations 1984 (S.I. No. 139 of 1984) 

European Communities (Scheduled Inter Regional Air Services) Regulations 
1987 (S.I. No. 215 of 1987) 

Air Navigation (Protection Area) Order 1988 (S.I. No. 284 of 1988) 

Air Navigation (Protection Area) Order 1989 (S.I. No. 114 of 1989) 

Air Navigation (Carriage of Munitions of War, Weapons and Dangerous Goods) 
(Amendment) Order 1989 (S.I. No. 130 of 1989) 

European Communities (Restriction of Aeroplane Operations) Regulations 1990 
(S.I. No. 235 of 1990) 

Road Vehicles (Registration and Licensing) Regulations, 1992 

Tour Operators (Licensing) Regulations 1993 (S.I. No. 182 of 1993) 

Travel Agents (Licensing) Regulations 1993 (S.I. No. 183 of 1993) 

Air Navigation (Protected Area) Order 1993 (S.I. No. 205 of 1993) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8 [759] 

European Communities (Speed Limitation Devices) Regulations (S.I. No. 300 
of 1993) as amended 

Air Navigation and Transport Act, 1965 (Section 8) (No. 2) Regulations, 1993 
(S.I. No. 3 24 of 1993) 

Air Services Authorisation Order 1993 (S.I. No. 326 of 1993) 

Air Navigation and Transport (Application of Regulations to State Aircraft) 
(Government) Order 1997 (S.I. No. 198 of 1997) 

Air Navigation and Transport (Application of Regulations to State Aircraft) 
(Ministerial) Order 1997 (S.I. No. 206 of 1997) 

European Communities (Minimum Safety and Health Requirements for 
Improved Medical Treatment on Board Vessels) Regulations 1997 (S.I. No. 506 
of 1997) 

European Communities (Proof of Compliance) Regulations 2000 (S.I. No. 223 
of 2000) 

European Communities (Safety of Fishing Vessels) Regulations 2002 (S.I. No. 
417 of 2002) 

European Communities (Driving Theoretical Tests) Regulations 2003 (S.I. No. 
52 of 2003) 

European Communities (Port Reception Facilities for Ship-Generated Waste and 
Cargo Residues) Regulations 2003 (S.l. No. 117 of 2003) 

European Communities (Safe Loading and Unloading of Bulk Carriers) 
Regulations 2003 (S.l. No. 347 of 2003) 

European Communities (Merchant Shipping) (Organisation of Working Time) 
Regulations 2003 (S.I. No. 532 of 2003) 

European Communities (Ship and Port Facilities) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 413 
of 2004) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [759] 9 

European Communities (Organisation of Working Time) (Mobile Staff in Civil 
Aviation) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 507 of 2006) 

Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006) 

European Communities (Port Security) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 284 of 2007) 

European Communities (Maritime) (International Safety Management Code) 
Regulations 2008 (S.I. No. 60 of 2008) 

European Communities (Vessel Traffic Monitoring and Information System) 
Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 573 of 2010) 

European Communities (Port State Control) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 656 of 
2010) 

European Communities (DublinAirport Charges) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 116 
of 2011) 

European Communities (Merchant Shipping) (Compliance with Flag State 
Requirements) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 260 of 2011) 

European Communities (Ship Inspection and Survey Organisations) Regulations 
2011 (S.I. No. 275 of 2011) 

European Union (International Road Haulage Market) Regulations 2011 (S.I. 
No. 698 of 2011) 

European Union (Liability of Carriers of Passengers by Sea) Regulations 2012 
(S.I. No. 552 of 2012) 

European Union (International Market for Coach and Bus Services) Regulations 
2013 (S.I. No. 506 of 2013) 

European Union (Training, Certification and Watchkeeping for Seafarers) 
Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 242 of 2014) 

European Union (Sulphur Content of Marine Fuels) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 
361 of 2015) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10 [759] 

European Union (Recreational Craft and Personal Watercraft) Regulations 2017 
(S.I. No. 65 of 2017) 

European Union (Marine Equipment) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 177 of 2017) 

European Union (Facilitation of Cross-Border Exchange of Information on 
Road-Safety Related Traffic Offences) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 371 of 2017) 

European Union (Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Maritime Transport) 
Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 476 of 2017) 

European Union (Occupation of Road Transport Operator) Regulations 2018 
(S.I. No. 265 of 2018) 

European Union (Ship Recycling) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 555 of 2018) 

European Union (Passenger Ships) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 676 of 2019) 

European Union (Registration of Persons Sailing on board Passenger Ships) 
Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 677 of 2019) 

European Union (System of Inspections for the Safe Operation of Ro-Ro 
Passenger Ships and High-Speed Passenger Craft in Regular Service) 
Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 679 of 2019) 

European Union (International Labour Organisation Work 
Convention) (Medical Examination) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 266 of 2020) 

in Fishing 

European Union (International Labour Organisation Work 
in Fishing 
Convention) (Fishing Vessel Owner Liability and Repatriation) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 332 of 2020) 

European Union (Workers on Board Seagoing Fishing Vessels) (Organisation of 
Working Time) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 441 of 2020) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [759] 11 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 12 [759]
